messages.content:
__*English (en-US) → English (en-US)*__
Hello

*The languages are the same.*

__*Deutsch (de) → Deutsch (de)*__
Wie geht's dir?

Die Sprachen sind gleich.

__*français (fr) → français (fr)*__
Bonjour, comment ça va?

*Les langues sont les mêmes.*
การแปลสาธารณะ
การแปลส่วนตัว

__*anglais (en-US) → français (fr)*__
Visitez [example.com](https://example.com) pour plus de détails.

__*French (fr) → English (en-US)*__
Here is a practical guide: _italic_ and [link](https://example.com)
(en-US)Vägen till guiden är understruken __här__. Ingen länk!

__*Swedish (sv-SE) → English (en-US)*__
The path to the guide is underlined __here__. No link!

__*Finnish (fi) → English (en-US)*__
The correct information is found here: https://data.fi
(en-US)Bonjour ~~mon ami~~ et voyez le guide ici!

__*French (fr) → English (en-US)*__
Hello ~~my friend~~ and see the guide here!

__*German (de), French (fr), English (en-US) → English (en-US)*__
Hello, hello, hello! Link: [example.com](https://example.com)

__*German (de), French (fr), English (en-US) → English (en-US)*__
Hello, hello, hello! Link: https://example.com
Here is a practical guide: _italic_ and [link](https://example.com)
(en-US)Vägen till guiden är understruken __här__. Ingen länk!
The path to the guide is underlined __here__. No link!
The correct information is found here: https://data.fi
(en-US)Bonjour ~~mon ami~~ et voyez le guide ici!
Hello ~~my friend~~ and see the guide here!
